source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
s.name AS SchemaName , t.name As TableName  
FROM  sys.tables t
INNER JOIN 
sys.schemas s  
ON s.schema_id = t.schema_id
WHERE s.name = 'SalesLT'

query.value: @concat('select coalesce(cast(max(loaddate) as date),''','1900-01-01',''') as last_fetched_date from audit.load_logs where',' data_source=''',item().Database,''' and tablename=''',item().tablename,'''')

@concat(
  'select *,''',
  item().database, ''' as datasource from ',
  item().database, '.', item().tablename,
  ' where ',
  item().watermark, ' >= ''',
  activity('Fetch_logs').output.firstRow.last_fetched_date,
  ''''
)

@concat(
  'insert into audit.load_logs(data_source,tablename,numberofrowscopied,watermarkcolumnname,loaddate) values (''',
  item().database, ''', ''',
  item().tablename, ''', ',
  activity('Incremental_cp').output.rowscopied, ', ''',
  item().watermark, ''', ''', utcNow(),''')')
@concat('select *,''', item().database, ''' as datasource from ', item().database, '.', item().tablename)
